titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to permit State and local governments to adopt or continue in force speed limits for trains lower than Federal speed limits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/7/1998--Introduced. Amends Federal railroad law to authorize State and local governments to adopt or continue in force lower speed limits for trains than those established by the Secretary of Transportation. (Currently, a State may adopt or continue in force a law, regulation, or order related to railroad safety that is not presently regulated by Federal law, or that is additional or more stringent than that regulated by Federal law.)
